channel.title: New items (customs) etc
channel.description:
Ok i have custom item models and some monters like spirit beast.. I have read through a few tuts..
Was wondering if anyone could write a short and simple way to add them into my server (Game) but ive only got the model files atm.
Thanks for the help, Jake :D

item.title: New items (customs) etc
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

add the models into the model folder, the ints into class8.java
compile, login, type add model ####
restart client, and do any serverside edits yourself or just ask

Read full topic
